## useDebouncedUpdates() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useDebouncedUpdates<S, A>([state, dispatch]: [S, Dispatch<A>], delay: number): [
    S,
    Dispatch<A> & {
        flush: () => void;
        cancel: () => void;
    }
];
```
